title: 404 Not Found
description: In this project, I work with HTML and CSS to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. In this page, you can see 404 page not found detail with home page button.

title: My Gallery
description: In this project, I work with HTML and CSS to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. In this page, you can see the gallery with profile details, number of posts, followers, and following.

title: Team Page
description: In this project, I work with HTML and CSS to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. In this page, you can see the team creative crew with profile photo, name, and position.

title: Random Quote Generator
description: In this project, I work with HTML, CSS, and javascript in React to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. This page generate a new random quote with quote genre under the author. When you select quote author, you can see a list of quotes from them.

title: Windbnb
description: In this project, I work with HTML, CSS, and Javascript in React to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. This page consist of apartment lists in Findland with details: name, rating, apartment type, and super host. You can filter the location and number of guests with the given button.

title: Interior Consultant
description: In this project, I work with HTML, CSS, and Javascript to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. This page consist of navigation bar, picture of interior design example, designer, and other details. On mobile, when you select the hamburger menu, you can see a navigation.

title: Recipe Page
description: In this project, I work with HTML, CSS, and Javascript to create a responsive page. The design is from devchallenge.io. This page consist of recipe with ingredients and instructions with number of servings and baking times. You can select a checkbox if you have the ingredients.
